roleset.name: try an elected official for a crime, remove same
roleset.note: IMPEACH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'impeach' based on sentences in wsj and automaticexpansion via verbnet. (from impeach.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passive
example.text: Mr. Hastings's case was particularly nettlesome because it marked the first time [a federal official]-1 was impeached *trace*-1 and removed from office on charges of which a jury had acquitted him.
example.arg: on charges of which a jury had acquitted him

example.name: all args
example.text: The internal investigation also impeached MiniScribe's auditors, Coopers& Lybrand, for allegedly ignoring numerous red flags.
example.arg: for allegedly ignoring numerous red flags
